English.alert_about: Make audio recordings of Siri reading aloud your text.
English.alert_end:
1. Tap the red Screen Recording icon in the status bar.

2. Tap Stop to end the recording.

3. Tap OK to display a menu of options for your recording.
English.alert_start:
1. Tap OK and choose the language of the inputted text.

2. Activate Screen Recording from Control Center. Ensure the microphone is turned off so your {{device}} does not record any background noise.

3. Wait for the red Screen Recording icon to appear in the status bar before tapping Done.
English.alert_update_none: You are running the latest version of Record Text to Speech
English.error_media_404:
The recording could not be found. Did you forget to:

 1. Start the screen recording?

2. Stop the screen recording?
English.error_offline: You must be connected to the internet to check for updates.
